name: Present Panic
description:
My first game jam and my first game! I learned a lot working on this project. There is no sound or music due to skill and time constraints. All art assets other than the box and opening logo are mine. The box art comes from https://opengameart.org/content/tux-bros, credit to Surt. Title screen logo generated on https://textcraft.net/.

Controls:
Move: Arrow keys, or gamepad left stick, or dpad
Jump: Spacebar or A on gamepad
Throw Sack: D, or  X on gamepad
Run: S, or X or Y on gamepad

Pressing Z will cycle through zoom levels.
